item.title: It's the 25th anniversary of The Sims - and some of the game's top streamers have revealed what they want - and don't want - to see from the movie being produced by Margot Robbie's film company. #TheSims #TheSims25 #EA #MaxisStudios #MargotRobbie #TheSims
